wordGroup: permissible value 容许值，允许值

sentences.en: Religious practices are permissible under the Constitution.
sentences.cn: 根据宪法，宗教行为是可允许的。

sentences.en: If it is permissible to interpolate a personal humble opinion, I may say that...
sentences.cn: 若允许陈述一下个人的管见，我则认为…。

sentences.en: Environmental campaigns that tell us how many people drive SUVs unwittingly imply that this behaviour is widespread and thus permissible.
sentences.cn: 环保运动告诉我们有多少人不知情地驾驶 SUV，这意味着这种行为是普遍的，因此是允许的。
